headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/79.0.3945.0 Safari/537.36

response.body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang='ru'>
  <head>
    <meta charset='utf-8'>
    <style>
      html, body {
        font-family: -apple-system, system-ui, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif;
        margin: 0;
        display: flex;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        background: #eee;
      }
      .wrap {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }
      .suggest {
        margin: 8px 0 16px;
        color: #777;
      }
      input {
        font-size: 40px;
        padding: 10px 24px;
        background: #fff;
        border: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 0 1px #aaa;
      }
      input:focus {
        outline: none;
      }
    </style>

    <title>Teremock // Form submit example</title>
  </head>

  <body>
    <form class='wrap' method='post' action='/form-submit'>
      <input name='firstname' type='text' autofocus placeholder="firstname" />
      <input name='lastname' type='text' placeholder="lastname" />

      <input id='submit' type='submit' text='submit' />
    </form>
  </body>
</html>
